processing_structure.text: Loop from 1 to the input value
Check if the number divides evenly (inside loop)
If divisible, add it to the sum (inside loop)

advice.text: Read each comment and make sure it is specific enough to be written as code; focus on the loop and output steps.
Plan an iteration from 1 up to n and a selection that tests whether the current value divides n evenly, then accumulate into sum.
Now implement: replace the loop comments with a for-style loop that visits each candidate divisor, use a remainder test to decide, add the divisor to sum when it divides, then print the sum.
